s: The chain of restaurants, Bubba ... founding. The score was composed and conducted by Alan Silvestri and was nominated for Best Original Score in the 67th Academy Awards. The legendary Score is now finally available on vinyl for the first time....

Now I have and I'm really glad that I did!!! I'm a huge film score fan, but I have to admit that I haven't really followed Alan Silvestri's career in recent years very closely. I loved his work on, say, "Back to the Future" and "The Abyss", but hadn't paid much attention to his work since.
